page.title: 10Games children play now
page.content: SARDINES One person goes and hides while the rest of the people count to 200 with their eyes shut. Once they have counted to 200 they go separately to try and find the person who is hiding. When the first person finds the person who was hidden they both stay hidden until everyone who was playing has found the person who hid originally. The first person who found the hider gets to hide from everyone in the next game. Hightig is just a normal game of chasing except that if you are standing or sitting on anything higher than ground level you can't be tigged. You are only allowed to be on the same thing for 20 secs.at the most. Once your 20 secs.are up you must not come off the high place to get chased to another. If caught you become chaser.
